mapper.select: SELECT no, cust_id, name, email, role, to_char(reg_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_day FROM cust_info

SELECT no, cust_id, name, email, role, to_char(reg_day, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS reg_day FROM cust_info WHERE 1=1 AND reg_day >= to_date(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND reg_day < to_date(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + interval '1 day'
AND name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
